name: Bravery Girl: The Mistical Island
description:
one of the fairy come to Bravery Girl to get help for their friend fairies that taken by the enemies, you can destroy them with mistical weapons that given in this game, but you have to becarefull they are strong enemies. they can destroy you too. they are the trolls, the bird monsters and another enemy inside. The way you can win every level of this game is you have to find the kingdom building. How brave you to play this game ? can you save all the fairies ? prove your self can do.
please enjoy.
